original_text: Son of man, set thy face toward the south, and drop thy word toward the south, and prophesy against the forest of the south field;
korean_text: 인자야 너는 얼굴을 남으로 향하라 남으로 향하여 소리내어 남쪽의 숲을 쳐서 예언하라

sentences.original_text: set thy face toward the south
and drop thy word toward the south
and prophesy against the forest of the south field
